synopsis.text: The story picks up a year after the main events of the anime series, as the school prepares to hold its annual festival. Daigo, friend of protagonist Kazuma, is feeling lonely without a girlfriend to attend the festivities with. With the cheerful celebration nearing, Daigo becomes determined to find a date, leading to amusing antics and interactions with various female classmates. Though his plans start out questionable, involving schemes to see girls naked under the guise of art, Daigo ultimately hopes to make a real romantic connection. Whether he actually succeeds in finding love remains to be seen. But his quest promises laughs and lighthearted moments for both Daigo and viewers, while also capturing the romantic possibilities such festivals represent for youth.
